name: Image Generator Tools
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Generates images based on a text prompt found in the payload. Uses the system's default Image AI Provider unless overridden.

ui_schema.label: Prompt Variable Path
ui_schema.description: Where to find the image prompt in the payload (e.g. 'data.prompt' or 'data.agent_final_answer').

ui_schema.label: AI Provider ID (Optional)
ui_schema.description: Force use of a specific provider (e.g., 'openai_dalle3', 'stability_sdxl'). If empty, uses the global default for Image tasks.

output_schema.name: data.generated_image_path
output_schema.description: The local path or URL to the generated image.
